stories.title: Epic gives away the entire Bioshock series for free

stories.text:
Yesterday, I published my startup for the first time here with (Show HN) and before publishing, I read the rules related to it and checked several times that nothing was violated. In fact, the text pattern I wrote was quite similar to previous launches (Dropbox, WebFlow, etc.).

If someone does not like a startup, why should he flag it? Instead of leaving a comment!

Or do I have to collect a certain number of points before publishing?

After more than ten years of following YC and the startup school and reading PG blogs about startups and stories about lunching in HN .... It was really disappointing.

Samples: My YC app: Dropbox - Throw away your USB drive (YC S07) Show HN: Codecademy.com, the easiest way to learn to code (YC S11) Show HN: Firebase, a scalable real-time backend (YC S11) Show HN: Webflow - Design responsive websites visually (YC S13)

My Post: [flagged] Show HN: Build, manage, and scale your ecommerce visually (selldone.com)
